title: MODERN 1 bedroom apartment available now -  411 Fairmount Ave #308
posting_body: ['411 Fairmount Avenue #308, Oakland, CA', '**CURRENT PROMOTION: MOVE IN / FURNITURE COST REIMBURSEMENT* - $ 2,500 Exclusions may apply.', 'Beautiful Modern Apartment in Historic Building', 'Open House:', 'Mondays - 6:00pm - 7:00pm, Hosted by Gabriel Galiothe', 'show contact info', 'Saturdays - 11:00am - 12:00pm, Hosted by Gabriel Galiothe', 'show contact info', 'Please register for the open house here:', '<URL>', '3D Virtual Tour here  <URL>', 'This apartment is in the Oakland Ave/Harrison St neighborhood in Oakland.', 'Nearby parks include Oak Glen Park, Mosswood Amphitheater and Mosswood Park.', '411 Fairmount Avenue Oakland CA 94611 has a Walk Score of 78 out of 100.', 'This location is Very Walkable so most errands can be accomplished on foot.', 'Walkscore: 78 "Very Walkable"', 'Lease Terms', 'Application Fully Completed', 'Two most recent bank statements', 'Two most recent pay stubs (or circle direct deposits on your bank statements)', 'Positive rental and credit history (minimum 600 credit score required)', 'Gross monthly income = 3 times the rent', 'Verifiable funds (bank balance)', '= 3 times the rent', 'Details', '1 Bed/ 1 Bath', 'Pets Allowed: Cats & Dogs', 'Amenities', 'Sunny, bright', 'Quiet', 'Cable/internet ready', 'Laundry facilities onsite', 'Smoke free unit', 'Tiled bathroom', 'Garbage disp', 'Tiled kitchen', 'Recently remodeled', 'Breakfast bar', 'High ceilings', 'Eat in kitchen', 'Built in shelving storage', 'Floor length mirrored closet doors', 'Large refrigerator', 'Live in onsite manager', 'Walk score: 99/100', 'Bike score: 92', 'Public transit score: 94/100', 'Shower/bathtub combo', 'Electric stove', 'Vinyl plank flooring', 'Granite Counters', 'On Site Laundry', 'Tile bathrooms', 'Tile kitchen', 'Sunny and bright']
